title: Fix MCP qms_review argument mapping and strengthen equivalence tests

comment: CR-065 review: COMPLIANT. All SOP-002 Section 6 requirements verified. Frontmatter: title='Fix MCP qms_review argument mapping and strengthen equivalence tests', revision_summary present and descriptive. All 12 required sections present and complete. No placeholder content in pre-approved sections (1-9). Traceability to CR-049, SOPs, and SDLC documents confirmed. Technical content is strong: defect clearly documented with code evidence (--outcome vs f"--{outcome}"), comprehensive audit of all MCP tool mappings in Section 5.2 confirms only qms_review is affected, and the test gap analysis is well-articulated. Section 7.2 correctly distinguishes that RS revision is driven by CR-049, not this CR. Combined requalification approach is consistent with CR-049 documentation. Formatting consistent, no typos or errors found. Recommend for approval.

CR-065 post-execution review: COMPLIANT. All 6 EIs completed with Pass outcomes, performer (claude), and date (2026-02-08). No placeholder content remains in execution sections. Execution summaries provide specific evidence: shared branch created, qms_review arg mapping fixed (--outcome to f"--{outcome}"), 3 MCP-layer tests added (test_qms_review_mcp_layer_recommend, test_qms_review_mcp_layer_request_updates, test_qms_route_mcp_layer), tests 369/369 (CI run 21803124788, commit 2fed599), RTM v10.0 EFFECTIVE, PR #8 merged (commit 32324af). Execution Comments and Execution Summary (Section 11) both filled in. Execution aligns with Implementation Plan phases 9.1-9.5. Combined requalification with CR-049 is consistently documented across both CRs. Recommend for post-approval.
